md:
giải nghĩa từ "differentiates" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Differentiates (verb) /dɪˈfɛrənʃieɪts/

* Meaning: to recognize or show the difference between two or more things
* Part of speech: verb
* Example sentence: The teacher differentiates between the students who need extra help and those who are advanced.
* Related words: differentiate, differentiation, different
* Antonyms: confuse, mix up, blend

Differentiates (verb) /dɪˈfɛrənʃieɪts/

* Meaning: to make something distinct or separate from others
* Part of speech: verb
* Example sentence: The company differentiates its products from those of its competitors by using unique packaging.
* Related words: differentiate, differentiation, distinct
* Antonyms: combine, merge, unite

Differentiates (verb) /dɪˈfɛrənʃieɪts/

* Meaning: to develop or acquire a distinct or specialized form or function
* Part of speech: verb
* Example sentence: The cells differentiate into different types of tissue during embryonic development.
* Related words: differentiate, differentiation, specialized
* Antonyms: remain, stay, unchanged
